org.apache.juneau.json

Class JsonParserContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserContext
        • org.apache.juneau.json.JsonParserContext

  • public final class JsonParserContext
extends ParserContext
    Configurable properties on the JsonParser class.

    Context properties are set by calling ContextFactory.setProperty(String, Object) on the context factory returned CoreApi.getContextFactory().

    The following convenience methods are also provided for setting context properties:

    • JsonParser.setProperty(String,Object)
    • JsonParser.setProperties(ObjectMap)
    • JsonParser.addNotBeanClasses(Class[])
    • JsonParser.addBeanFilters(Class[])
    • JsonParser.addPojoSwaps(Class[])
    • JsonParser.addToDictionary(Class[])
    • JsonParser.addImplClass(Class,Class)

    See ContextFactory for more information about context properties.

    Configurable properties on the JSON parser
    Setting nameDescriptionData typeDefault value
    JSON_strictMode Strict mode Boolean false
    Configurable properties inherited from parent classes
    • BeanContext - Properties associated with handling beans on serializers and parsers.
      • ParserContext - Configurable properties common to all parsers.
    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

    • Field Detail

      • JSON_strictMode

        public static final String JSON_strictMode
        Configuration property: Strict mode.

        • Name: "JsonParser.strictMode"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false

        When in strict mode, parser throws exceptions on the following invalid JSON syntax:

        • Unquoted attributes.
        • Missing attribute values.
        • Concatenated strings.
        • Javascript comments.
        • Numbers and booleans when Strings are expected.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Constructor.

        Typically only called from ContextFactory.getContext(Class).

        Parameters:
        cf - The factory that created this context.
